attributes.action: Change the rules in Cedar mount academy
attributes.additional_details: Cedar mount academy is putting to much pressure on the students we want more freedom we have 25 mins of lunch
attributes.background: Help the students of cedar mount academy to get freedom from the teachers

rejection.details:
Decisions on school lunch times are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are unhappy with how you school handles lunch times and other matters, you should raise this with the school or relevant local authority.
